meanings.definition: A tropical shrub with clusters of bright red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The ixora in our garden blooms beautifully in the summer.
meanings.sent2: I planted an ixora bush near the window to add color to the yard.
meanings.sent3: The ixora seemed to be showing off its vibrant flowers to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a cluster of ixora flowers in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The ixora's red flowers stood out like a beacon in the green garden.

meanings.definition: The genus of plants to which the ixora belongs.
meanings.sent1: Ixora plants are known for their striking flowers.
meanings.sent2: The ixora genus includes many different species of tropical plants.
meanings.sent3: At the botanical garden, we marveled at the variety of ixora plants.
meanings.sent4: The ixora genus is like a colorful family tree of tropical flora.
meanings.sent5: Each ixora plant in the genus has its own unique beauty to offer.
